name: Universe Cartographer
description:
Discover general relativity and play with it !

The universe's map has been lost ! Luckily, our satellites are still in their right positions and, with our simulation's help, we can rediscover every planets' and stars' location. All of that with the help of the curvature in space-time canvas they create !

A puzzle where light is deviated by the space-time canvas, while  shaped by our actions in the simulation.

A game developped by the T-CLUB as part of the HUM-380 course at the EPFL (2020)

Disclaimer: Every image used that wasn't created by members of our team were icons made by Freepik and Those Icons on www.flaticon.com
